code: import{CHAT_DATA}from"../constants/action-types";var initialState={chatData:[]};var chatDataReducer=function chatDataReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case CHAT_DATA:return Object.assign({},state,{chatData:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default chatDataReducer;
